document.masterDocTitle: First checklist of pyraloid moths (Lepidoptera: Pyraloidea) in Croatia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First checklist of pyraloid moths (Lepidoptera: Pyraloidea) in Croatia

subSubSection.paragraph:
*
Agrotera nemoralis (Scopoli, 1763)
; Mann 1867 a (P), Mann 1869 (M),
Abafi-Aigner et al. 1896
(P), Rebel 1904 (K, M), Schawerda 1921 (M), Prohaska 1922 (M), Rebel 1924 (M), Habeler 2003 (M), Slamka 2013 (P, M), Koren 2015 (M), Koren 2018 (K), Coll. Gumhalter (K, P), Coll. Igalffy (K), Coll. Koča (K)

Syn.
Agrotera nemoralis
(S.V.); Mann 1857 (M)

*

; Rebel 1904 (M), Rothschild 1914 (M), Klimesch 1942 (M), Habeler 2003 (M), Slamka 2013 (M)

Syn.

; Rebel 1914 (M)

**

; Koren & Črne 2012 (M), Matošević & Pajač Živković 2013 (M), Matošević 2013 (K), Koren 2018 (K), Coll. Gumhalter (K, M)
